verses.name: Zechariah 5:9
verses.text: Then lifted I up mine eyes, and looked, and, behold, there came out two women, and the wind was in their wings; for they had wings like the wings of a stork: and they lifted up the ephah between the earth and the heaven.

verses.name: Zechariah 5:10
verses.text: Then said I to the angel that talked with me, Whither do these bear the ephah?

verses.name: Zechariah 5:11
verses.text: And he said unto me, To build it an house in the land of Shinar: and it shall be established, and set there upon her own base.
